Peek-A-Boo

by Team Pixelboy

Released Jan 1, 2010
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

Come play with Elmo in his play room! Introducing the latest offering from the wizards at Dvik and Joyrex, a game designed specifically for toddlers and pre-schoolers (ages 1 to 6)! Elmo of Sesame Street is hiding in his play room, and he wants to play a game of peek-a-boo with you!
